SEARCH
Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.hofmaad
Package model

Class IPAddress

java.lang.Object
model.IPAddress
public class IPAddress extends Object
Represents an IP address in IPv4 format, storing each octet as an integer. Provides utility functions for IP address manipulation and conversion between formats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an IPAddress using four integers representing the octets.

    Constructs an IPAddress by copying another IPAddress.

  • Method Details

    • incrementOctet

      public void incrementOctet(int octet, int increment)
      Increments a specified octet by a given amount.
      Parameters:
      octet - the octet to increment (1 to 4)
      increment - the amount to add to the octet

    • toLong

      Converts this IP address to a long integer representation.
      Returns:
      the long integer representation of this IP address

    • longToIPAddress

      Converts a long integer to an IPAddress object.
      Parameters:
      ipAsLong - the long integer representation of the IP address
      Returns:
      an IPAddress object corresponding to the given long integer
